folder.name: WELLS Data Analysis
folder.description: Snippets to list known datea quality issues - can be exported to Excel.

display.name: SEALANT_MATERIAL sorted by most-common
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.SEALANT_MATERIAL values, grouped and sorted by most-records-in-this-group to least-records-in-this-group.

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when sealant_material is null or sealant_material in ('UNKNOWN','NOT PROVIDED') then 'null / UNKNOWN / NOT PROVIDED' when upper(sealant_material) in ('GROUT') then 'GROUT' when upper(sealant_material) in ('BENSEAL') then 'BENSEAL' when upper(sealant_material) in ('CEMENT') then 'CEMENT' when upper(sealant_material) in ('BENONITE','BETNONITE','BETNONITE','BEOTNITE') then 'BENONITE' when upper(sealant_material) in ('BENTONITE GROUT','BENTONITE FROUT') then 'BENTONITE GROUT' when upper(sealant_material) in ('3/8 BENTONITE','3/8 BENTONITE CHIPS') then '3/8 BENTONITE or 3/8 BENTONITE CHIPS' when upper(sealant_material) in ('BENTONITE', 'BENTIONITE','BENT') then 'BENTONITE, BENTIONITE,BENT' when upper(sealant_material) in ('BENTONITE CHIPS', 'BENTONITE CHIP','BENT CHIPS') then 'BENTONITE CHIPS, BENTONITE CHIP,BENT CHIPS' else sealant_material end as analysis_grp from wells_wells ) group by analysis_grp order by count(*) desc

display.name: SEALANT_MATERIAL sorted alphabetically
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.SEALANT_MATERIAL values, grouped and sorted by the text value (to show mis-spellings or variations of).

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when sealant_material is null or sealant_material in ('UNKNOWN','NOT PROVIDED') then 'null / UNKNOWN / NOT PROVIDED' when upper(sealant_material) in ('GROUT') then 'GROUT' when upper(sealant_material) in ('BENSEAL') then 'BENSEAL' when upper(sealant_material) in ('CEMENT') then 'CEMENT' when upper(sealant_material) in ('BENONITE','BETNONITE','BETNONITE','BEOTNITE') then 'BENONITE' when upper(sealant_material) in ('BENTONITE GROUT','BENTONITE FROUT') then 'BENTONITE GROUT' when upper(sealant_material) in ('3/8 BENTONITE','3/8 BENTONITE CHIPS') then '3/8 BENTONITE or 3/8 BENTONITE CHIPS' when upper(sealant_material) in ('BENTONITE', 'BENTIONITE','BENT') then 'BENTONITE, BENTIONITE,BENT' when upper(sealant_material) in ('BENTONITE CHIPS', 'BENTONITE CHIP','BENT CHIPS') then 'BENTONITE CHIPS, BENTONITE CHIP,BENT CHIPS' else sealant_material end as analysis_grp from wells_wells ) group by analysis_grp order by analysis_grp

display.name: TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP sorted by most-common
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP values, grouped and sorted by most-records-in-this-group to least-records-in-this-group.

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP is null or TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP in ('UNKNOWN','NOT PROVIDED') then 'null / UNKNOWN / NOT PROVIDED' when upper(TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP) in ('6" ALUMINIUM CAP', '6" ALUMINIUM CAP.','6" ALUMINUM CAP') then '6" ALUMINIUM CAP' when upper(TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP) in ('6" WATER TIGHT','6" WATERTIGHT') then '6" WATER TIGHT' when upper(TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP) in ('6"','6 INCH') then '6" / 6 INCH' else upper(trim(TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP)) end as analysis_grp from wells_wells ) group by analysis_grp order by count(*) desc

display.name: TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP sorted alphabetically
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP values, grouped and sorted by the text value (to show mis-spellings or variations of).

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP is null or TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP in ('UNKNOWN','NOT PROVIDED') then 'null / UNKNOWN / NOT PROVIDED' when upper(TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP) in ('6" ALUMINIUM CAP', '6" ALUMINIUM CAP.','6" ALUMINUM CAP') then '6" ALUMINIUM CAP' when upper(TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP) in ('6" WATER TIGHT','6" WATERTIGHT') then '6" WATER TIGHT' when upper(TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP) in ('6"','6 INCH') then '6" / 6 INCH' else upper(trim(TYPE_OF_WELL_CAP)) end as analysis_grp from wells_wells ) group by analysis_grp order by analysis_grp

display.name: WHERE_PLATE_ATTACHED sorted by most-common
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.WHERE_PLATE_ATTACHED values, grouped and sorted by most-records-in-this-group to least-records-in-this-group.

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when WHERE_PLATE_ATTACHED is null or WHERE_PLATE_ATTACHED in ('UKNOWN','UNKNONW','UNKNOQN','UNKNOWN','UNKNOWNU','UNKNWON','UNKOWN','NO WELL TAG', 'NO WELL TAG ATTACHED','NONE','NONE AT THIS TIME','NONE ATTACHED') then 'null / UNKNOWN / NONE / etc.' else upper(trim(WHERE_PLATE_ATTACHED)) end as analysis_grp from wells_wells ) group by analysis_grp order by count(*) desc

display.name: WHERE_PLATE_ATTACHED sorted alphabetically
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.WHERE_PLATE_ATTACHED values, grouped and sorted by the text value (to show mis-spellings or variations of).

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when WHERE_PLATE_ATTACHED is null or WHERE_PLATE_ATTACHED in ('UKNOWN','UNKNONW','UNKNOQN','UNKNOWN','UNKNOWNU','UNKNWON','UNKOWN','NO WELL TAG', 'NO WELL TAG ATTACHED','NONE','NONE AT THIS TIME','NONE ATTACHED') then 'null / UNKNOWN / NONE / etc.' else upper(trim(WHERE_PLATE_ATTACHED)) end as analysis_grp from wells_wells ) group by analysis_grp order by analysis_grp

display.name: BACKFILL_TYPE sorted by most-common
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.BACKFILL_TYPE values, grouped and sorted by most-records-in-this-group to least-records-in-this-group.

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when BACKFILL_TYPE is null or BACKFILL_TYPE in ('NONE') then 'null / NONE' else upper(trim(BACKFILL_TYPE)) end as analysis_grp from wells_wells ) group by analysis_grp order by count(*) desc

display.name: BACKFILL_TYPE sorted alphabetically
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.BACKFILL_TYPE values, grouped and sorted by the text value (to show mis-spellings or variations of).

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when BACKFILL_TYPE is null or BACKFILL_TYPE in ('NONE') then 'null / NONE' else upper(trim(BACKFILL_TYPE)) end as analysis_grp from wells_wells ) group by analysis_grp order by analysis_grp

display.name: BACKFILL_MATERIAL sorted by most-common
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.BACKFILL_MATERIAL values, grouped and sorted by most-records-in-this-group to least-records-in-this-group.

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when BACKFILL_MATERIAL is null or BACKFILL_MATERIAL in ('UNKNOWN','UNKNOWN MATERIAL','NONE','NOT APPLICABLE','NOT PROVIDED') then 'null / UNKNOWN / NONE / NOT APPLICABLE / NOT PROVIDED' else upper(trim(BACKFILL_MATERIAL)) end as analysis_grp from wells_wells ) group by analysis_grp order by count(*) desc

display.name: BACKFILL_MATERIAL sorted alphabetically
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.BACKFILL_MATERIAL values, grouped and sorted by the text value (to show mis-spellings or variations of).

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when BACKFILL_MATERIAL is null or BACKFILL_MATERIAL in ('UNKNOWN','UNKNOWN MATERIAL','NONE','NOT APPLICABLE','NOT PROVIDED') then 'null / UNKNOWN / NONE / NOT APPLICABLE / NOT PROVIDED' else upper(trim(BACKFILL_MATERIAL)) end as analysis_grp from wells_wells ) group by analysis_grp order by analysis_grp

display.name: WELLS.DIAMETER sorted by most-common
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.DIAMETER values, grouped and sorted by most-records-in-this-group to least-records-in-this-group.

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when diameter is null or diameter = '0.0' or diameter = '0' or diameter='UNK' then '0 / (null) / UNK' when NOT REGEXP_LIKE(diameter,'^-?\d+(\.\d+)?$') then diameter when to_number(diameter) > 0 and to_number(diameter) < 1 then '> 000 and < 1.0' when to_number(diameter) >= 1 and to_number(diameter) < 2 then '>= 001 (inclusive) and < 2' when to_number(diameter) >= 2 and to_number(diameter) < 3 then '>= 002 (inclusive) and < 3' when to_number(diameter) >= 3 and to_number(diameter) < 4 then '>= 003 (inclusive) and < 4' when to_number(diameter) >= 4 and to_number(diameter) < 5 then '>= 004 (inclusive) and < 5' when to_number(diameter) >= 5 and to_number(diameter) < 6 then '>= 005 (inclusive) and < 6' when diameter = '6.' or (to_number(diameter) >= 6 and to_number(diameter) < 7) then '>= 006 (inclusive) and < 7' when to_number(diameter) >= 7 and to_number(diameter) < 8 then '>= 007 (inclusive) and < 8' when to_number(diameter) >= 8 and to_number(diameter) < 9 then '>= 008 (inclusive) and < 9' when to_number(diameter) >= 9 and to_number(diameter) < 10 then '>= 009 (inclusive) and < 10' when to_number(diameter) >= 10 and to_number(diameter) < 11 then '>= 010 (inclusive) and < 11' when to_number(diameter) >= 11 and to_number(diameter) < 12 then '>= 011 (inclusive) and < 12' when to_number(diameter) >= 12 and to_number(diameter) < 13 then '>= 012 (inclusive) and < 13' when to_number(diameter) >= 13 and to_number(diameter) < 20 then '>= 013 (inclusive) and < 20' when to_number(diameter) >= 20 and to_number(diameter) < 30 then '>= 020 (inclusive) and < 30' when to_number(diameter) >= 30 and to_number(diameter) < 40 then '>= 030 (inclusive) and < 40' when to_number(diameter) >= 40 and to_number(diameter) < 50 then '>= 040 (inclusive) and < 50' when to_number(diameter) >= 50 and to_number(diameter) < 60 then '>= 050 (inclusive) and < 60' when to_number(diameter) >= 60 and to_number(diameter) < 100 then '>= 060 (inclusive) and < 100' when to_number(diameter) >= 100 and to_number(diameter) < 200 then '>= 100 (inclusive) and < 200' when to_number(diameter) >= 200 and to_number(diameter) < 500 then '>= 200 (inclusive) and < 500' else diameter end as analysis_grp from wells_wells ) group by analysis_grp order by count(*) desc

display.name: WELLS.DIAMETER sorted by range
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.DIAMETER values, grouped and sorted by the numeric range

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when diameter is null or diameter = '0.0' or diameter = '0' or diameter='UNK' then ' 0 / (null) / UNK' when NOT REGEXP_LIKE(diameter,'^-?\d+(\.\d+)?$') then diameter when to_number(diameter) > 0 and to_number(diameter) < 1 then ' > 000 and < 1.0' when to_number(diameter) >= 1 and to_number(diameter) < 2 then ' >= 001 (inclusive) and < 2' when to_number(diameter) >= 2 and to_number(diameter) < 3 then ' >= 002 (inclusive) and < 3' when to_number(diameter) >= 3 and to_number(diameter) < 4 then ' >= 003 (inclusive) and < 4' when to_number(diameter) >= 4 and to_number(diameter) < 5 then ' >= 004 (inclusive) and < 5' when to_number(diameter) >= 5 and to_number(diameter) < 6 then ' >= 005 (inclusive) and < 6' when diameter = '6.' or (to_number(diameter) >= 6 and to_number(diameter) < 7) then ' >= 006 (inclusive) and < 7' when to_number(diameter) >= 7 and to_number(diameter) < 8 then ' >= 007 (inclusive) and < 8' when to_number(diameter) >= 8 and to_number(diameter) < 9 then ' >= 008 (inclusive) and < 9' when to_number(diameter) >= 9 and to_number(diameter) < 10 then ' >= 009 (inclusive) and < 10' when to_number(diameter) >= 10 and to_number(diameter) < 11 then ' >= 010 (inclusive) and < 11' when to_number(diameter) >= 11 and to_number(diameter) < 12 then ' >= 011 (inclusive) and < 12' when to_number(diameter) >= 12 and to_number(diameter) < 13 then ' >= 012 (inclusive) and < 13' when to_number(diameter) >= 13 and to_number(diameter) < 20 then ' >= 013 (inclusive) and < 20' when to_number(diameter) >= 20 and to_number(diameter) < 30 then ' >= 020 (inclusive) and < 30' when to_number(diameter) >= 30 and to_number(diameter) < 40 then ' >= 030 (inclusive) and < 40' when to_number(diameter) >= 40 and to_number(diameter) < 50 then ' >= 040 (inclusive) and < 50' when to_number(diameter) >= 50 and to_number(diameter) < 60 then ' >= 050 (inclusive) and < 60' when to_number(diameter) >= 60 and to_number(diameter) < 100 then ' >= 060 (inclusive) and < 100' when to_number(diameter) >= 100 and to_number(diameter) < 200 then ' >= 100 (inclusive) and < 200' when to_number(diameter) >= 200 and to_number(diameter) < 500 then ' >= 200 (inclusive) and < 500' else diameter end as analysis_grp from wells_wells ) group by analysis_grp order by analysis_grp

display.name: SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE sorted by most-common
display.description: WELLS_WELLS.SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE values, grouped and sorted by most-records-in-this-group to least-records-in-this-group.

query.sql: select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE is null or SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE = 0 then ' 0 / (null)' else to_char(SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE) end as analysis_grp from wells_screens ) group by analysis_grp order by count(*) desc

display.name: DETAILS
display.description: Detailed WELLS_SCREENS records

query.sql: null

display.name: SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE sorted by range
display.description: WELLS_SCREENS.SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE values, grouped and sorted by the numeric range

query.sql:
select analysis_grp, count(*) from ( select case when SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE is null or SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE = 0 then ' 0 / (null)' when SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE > 0 and SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE < 1 then ' > 000 and < 1.0' when SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE >= 1 and SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE < 10 then ' >= 001 (inclusive) and < 10' when SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE >= 10 and SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE < 100 then ' >= 010 (inclusive) and < 100' when SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE >= 100 and SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE < 200 then ' >= 100 (inclusive) and < 200' when SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE >= 200 and SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE < 300 then ' >= 200 (inclusive) and < 300' when SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE >= 300 and SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE < 500 then ' >= 300 (inclusive) and < 500' when SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE >= 500 and SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE < 1000 then ' >= 500 (inclusive) and < 1000'
else to_char(SCREEN_SLOT_SIZE) end as analysis_grp from wells_screens ) group by analysis_grp order by analysis_grp

display.name: CLASS, SUBCLASS grouped by combination
display.description: Listing of all combinations of CLASS and SUBCLASS of WELL

query.sql: SELECT NVL2(CLASS_OF_WELL_CODCLASSIFIED_BY,CLASS_OF_WELL_CODCLASSIFIED_BY,'(null)') || NVL2(subclass_of_well_classified_by,' : ' || subclass_of_well_classified_by ,NULL) AS CLASS_SUBCLASS, COUNT(*) FROM WELLS.WELLS_WELLS GROUP BY NVL2(CLASS_OF_WELL_CODCLASSIFIED_BY,CLASS_OF_WELL_CODCLASSIFIED_BY,'(null)') || NVL2(subclass_of_well_classified_by,' : ' || subclass_of_well_classified_by ,NULL) ORDER BY CLASS_SUBCLASS

display.name: PERFORATIONS.Lliner_thickness sorted by most-common
display.description: WELLS_PERFORATIONS.Lliner_thickness values, grouped and sorted by most-records-in-this-group to least-records-in-this-group.

query.sql: SELECT distinct(WELLS.WELLS_PERFORATIONS.LINER_THICKNESS), count(*) FROM WELLS.WELLS_PERFORATIONS group by WELLS.WELLS_PERFORATIONS.LINER_THICKNESS order by count(*) desc

display.name: PERFORATIONS.liner_thickness sorted by range
display.description: WELLS_PERFORATIONS.liner_thickness values, grouped and sorted by the numeric range

query.sql: SELECT distinct(WELLS.WELLS_PERFORATIONS.LINER_THICKNESS), count(*) FROM WELLS.WELLS_PERFORATIONS group by WELLS.WELLS_PERFORATIONS.LINER_THICKNESS order by WELLS.WELLS_PERFORATIONS.LINER_THICKNESS

display.name: WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_WALL sorted by most-common
display.description: CASINGS.CASING_WALL values, grouped and sorted by most-records-in-this-group to least-records-in-this-group.

query.sql: SELECT distinct(WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_WALL), count(*) FROM WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS group by WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_WALL order by count(*) desc

display.name: WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_WALL sorted by range
display.description: CASINGS.CASING_WALL values, grouped and sorted by the numeric range

query.sql: SELECT distinct(WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_WALL), count(*) FROM WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS group by WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_WALL order by WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_WALL

display.name: WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_MATERIAL_CODE sorted by most-common
display.description: CASINGS.CASING_MATERIAL_CODE values, grouped and sorted by most-records-in-this-group to least-records-in-this-group.

query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_MATERIAL_CODE, COUNT(*) FROM WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS GROUP BY WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_MATERIAL_CODE order by count(*) desc

display.name: WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_MATERIAL_CODE sorted by range
display.description: CASINGS.CASING_MATERIAL_CODE values, grouped and sorted by the numeric range

query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_MATERIAL_CODE, COUNT(*) FROM WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS GROUP BY WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_MATERIAL_CODE order by WELLS.WELLS_CASINGS.CASING_MATERIAL_CODE

display.name: WELLS_WELLS.LINER_MATERIAL_CODE
display.description: WELLS.LINER_MATERIAL_CODE values, grouped and sorted

query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT WELLS.WELLS_WELLS.LINER_MATERIAL_CODE, COUNT(*) FROM WELLS.WELLS_WELLS GROUP BY WELLS.WELLS_WELLS.LINER_MATERIAL_CODE
